section.title: Environment
section.para: In order to use Pegasus, you will have to set the PEGASUS_HOME environment variable, and source the Pegasus setup script.
This document assumes you are using a Bourne Shell derived shell. e.g. /bin/sh or /bin/bash. csh setup scripts are available with the .csh extension.

programlisting.emphasis: $ unset PEGASUS_HOME $ export PEGASUS_HOME=<path to pegasus directory>

section.para: Set up the PEGASUS user environment
